categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Scout Three" was a female individual who served as a pilot in the Alliance to Restore the Republic in their Starfighter Corps during the Galactic Civil War. While on patrol, Scout Three and her wingman, Scout Two were exploring Scarif when they discovered that the Galactic Empire was building a massive space station. She was shot down by a TIE/ln space superiority starfighter before she was able to escape.
Scout Three is voiced by Emily O'Brien.
